name: Balls Clicker: An OK FREE Mobile Port
name_original: Balls Clicker: An OK FREE Mobile Port
description:
So, here's the deal:

  • An addictive idle clicker game
  • NO Ads (do not let the screenshot fool you)
  • NO microtransactions
  • Reasonal support from dev
  • All of the above for FREE

What else do you want from me? Just download the game already, and leave me alone!

Actually, don't leave me alone if you do like the game. Giving me a Follow is much appreciated.
